scripts.test_be: export NODE_ENV=TEST; export TEST_ID=be; cd tests/; webpack && mocha build/backend.js || true
scripts.test_fe: export NODE_ENV=TEST; export TEST_ID=fe; cd tests/; webpack && mocha build/frontend.js || true
scripts.test_in: export NODE_ENV=TEST; export TEST_ID=in; cd tests/; webpack && mocha build/integration.js || true
scripts.test: npm run test_be; npm run test_fe; npm run test_renders
scripts.start: export NODE_ENV=DEV; concurrently "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.bootstrap: export NODE_ENV=DEV; cd tools/bootstrap/; webpack && node build/bootstrap.js || true
